58969.遊びにいきたい家の\nテーマを選択してください。\n<break>:
Select the theme of the house you wish to
visit.
<break>

58970.『他の人の家へ』を使えば この大陸の住宅村で\nウェルカムハウス設定にしている誰:
"To Other House" allows you to jump in front of a house that has been set as a Welcome House in the residences of this continent.
However, you don't know which house you will go to. The place you go to changes every time, so please try again to visit different houses.

58971.今この住宅村には\nウェルカムハウスが まだ１軒もないようです。\nしばらくした:
Right now there doesn't seem to be a single
Welcome House in this residences yet. Please
try again in a while.

60579.「現在 この家は ウェルカムハウスに\n 設定されています。\n ウェルカムハウ:
The house is currently set as a Welcome House.
<yesno><break>

60580.「現在 この家は ウェルカムハウスに\n 設定されていません。\n ウェルカムハ:
This house is not currently set up as a
Welcome House, do you know about Welcome
House?
<yesno><break>

60581.「『家への出入り』を『だれでもＯＫ』にしたので\n この家を ウェルカムハウスに:
I have set "Anyone is OK" for "In and Out" so
I can set this house as a Welcome House.
<yesno><break>

60582.「では この家を\n ウェルカムハウスに 設定しますか？\n<yesno><br:
So, would you like to set this house up as a
Welcome House?
<yesno><break>

60583.「ウェルカムハウス設定を やめました。\n 『他の人の家へ』の検索対象からはずれ:
The "Welcome House" setting has been removed.
To Other House" is no longer included in the
search.
<bw_break>

60584.「はい。この家を\n <%sL_CATEGORY> の\n ウェルカムハウスに:
Yes. I have set this house as a Welcome House
in <%sL_CATEGORY>.
<bw_break>

60585.「これより『家への出入り』が できるのは\n 『だれでもＯＫ』になりました。\n:
From now on, "Anyone is OK" can enter and
leave the house.
<bw_break>

60586.「ウェルカムハウスに 設定すると\n たくさんの人が この家を見つけて\n 遊び:
You can set your house as a "Welcome House", and many people will find your house and come to visit. Please be careful to set the
permissions for furniture and other items, as the Welcome House setting automatically allows anyone to enter and leave the house.

60587.「では 説明します。ウェルカムハウスに\n 設定すると たくさんの人が この家を:
You can set your house's points of pride in the Welcome House and choose the house you want to fly to for each pride you have set.
The Welcome House can be accessed from the door menu, and a balloon will be placed above the sign outside the house so that other
people can easily recognize it. Please be careful to set permissions for furniture and other items, as there may be a lot of people
around.

60736.「<%sL_CATEGORY>に\n 設定してよろしいですか？\n<yesno>:
Are you sure you want to set it to
<%sL_CATEGORY>?
<yesno><break>

60738.「どのカテゴリに 設定しますか？\n<break>:
Which category do you want to set?
<break>

61117.<%sL_CATEGORY>の\nウェルカムハウスに 遊びに行きますか？\n<y:
Would you like to visit the Welcome House at
<%sL_CATEGORY>?
<yesno><break>

61235.<%sL_CATEGORY>の家は\n<%nL_WELCOME_NUM>軒ありま:
<%sL_CATEGORY> has <%dL_WELCOME_NUM> houses.
Would you like to play?
<yesno><break>

62374.「現在 この家は ウェルカムハウスに\n 設定されています。\n どのように 設:
The house is currently set as a Welcome House.
How would you like to set it?
<select_se_off>
Category Settings
Cancel Welcome
<select_end><break>

114294.このカテゴリには\nウェルカムハウスが まだ１軒もないようです。\nしばらくした:
There doesn't seem to be a single Welcome

in a while.

247174.「『マイタウンへの出入り』を『だれでもＯＫ』に\n したので ウェルカムハウスに:
I set "Allowed to Visit" to "Anyone is OK" so
I can set it to Welcome House.
<yesno><break>

247175.「では このマイタウンを\n ウェルカムハウスに 設定しますか？\n<yesno:
So, do you want to set up My Town as a Welcome
House?
<yesno><break>

247176.「これより 『マイタウンへの出入り』と\n 『家への出入り』が できるのは\n:
From now on, "Allowed to Visit" and "In and
Out of the House" are available to "Anyone is
OK".
<bw_break>

247530.『他の人の家へ』を使えば\nウェルカムハウス設定にしている誰かの家の前に\nひと:
To Other House" allows you to jump in front of a house that has been set as a Welcome House.
However, you don't know which house you will go to. The place you go to changes every time, so please try again to visit different houses.

248272.「これより\n 『マイタウンへの出入り』が できるのは\n 『だれでもОＫ』にな:
From now on, "Allowed to Visit" is available
to "Anyone".
<bw_break>

248273.「ウェルカムハウスに 設定すると\n たくさんの人が このマイタウンの家を見つけ:
You can set your house as a Welcome House, and you can choose the house you want to fly to for each of the charms you have set up. You
can also access the Welcome House by selecting a theme from the door menu of each house, or from outside of My Town from the Land Manager
Listeah or from the signport staff at the entrance of each residences. If you set your house as a Welcome House, "Allowed to Visit"
and "Anyone is OK" will automatically appear on the sign outside your house. Please be careful when setting permissions for
furniture, garden, furniture, etc.

248306.「ウェルカムハウス設定を やめました。\n 『他の人のマイタウンへ』と『他の人の:
The "Welcome House" setting has been removed. The "To Other Town" and "To Other House" searches are no longer included in the search
results.

249980.「ウェルカムハウス設定を やめました。\n すべての家が『他の人のマイタウンへ』:
The Welcome House setting has been removed.
All houses are no longer included in the "To
Other Town" and "To Other House" search.
<bw_break>

290490.ウェルカム中の チームメンバーの\nマイタウンへ 訪問します。\n訪問先を 選ん:
